params.fields: TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DAY, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PERIOD, COMPANY_ID, COMPANY_BRAND_ID, BRANCH_ID, OS_TYPE, SUM(CUSTOM_COUNT) AS CUSTOM_COUNT, SUM(VISIT_COUNT) AS VISIT_COUNT, SUM(STAY_TIME) AS STAY_TIME
params.condition: DAY >= '20161201' AND DAY <= '20161201' AND COMPANY_ID = 14112 AND COMPANY_BRAND_ID = 14113 AND BRANCH_ID = 43872
